Package com.example.geoquizfrontend.services

Class CountryService

java.lang.Object
com.example.geoquizfrontend.services.CountryService
public class CountryService extends Object
CountryService is a class that handles network requests related to countries. It uses Volley to send HTTP requests and receive HTTP responses from the server. The class provides methods for getting data about countries and parsing the responses.
See Also:
  • RequestQueue
  • JsonArrayRequest
  • Response
  • VolleyError
